bioconda.name: bioconductor-rimmport
bioconda.summary: RImmPort: Enabling Ready-for-analysis Immunology Research Data

biotools.summary: This package simplifies access to ImmPort data for analysis in the R environment. It provides a standards-based interface to the ImmPort study data that is in a proprietary format.

bioschemas.name: RImmPort
bioschemas.summary: This package simplifies access to ImmPort data for analysis in the R environment. It provides a standards-based interface to the ImmPort study data that is in a proprietary format.
